topic.body:
According to the Jewish Talmud Jewish excrements mixed with honey should be consumed
The Talmud is the most holly book of the Jews.
Jewish Talmud: Gittin 69a . To heal his flesh a Jew should take dust that lies within the shadow of an outdoor toilet, mix with honey and eat it.
topic.title: According to the Jewish Talmud Jewish excrements mixed with honey should be consumed
